titles.title: Veterans Travel Fairness Act

To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the rate of reimbursement for motor vehicle travel under the beneficiary travel program of the Department of Veterans Affairs shall be the same as the rate for private vehicle reimbursement for Federal employees.
Veterans Travel Fairness Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Veterans Travel Fairness Act - Makes the rate of reimbursement for private vehicle travel under the beneficiary travel program of the Department of Veterans Affairs equal to the rate for private vehicle reimbursement for Federal employees.
